price: Na vivi hivi tumemfanyia kila Nabii adui miongoni mwa wakosefu, na Mola wako Mlezi anatosha kuwa Mwenye kuongoa na Mwenye kunusuru.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِيٗا وَنَصِيرٗا
footnotes: Kama tulivyo wajaalia watu wako, ewe Muhammad, wanavyo kufanyia uadui na kukukadhibisha, basi kadhaalika tulimjaalia kila Nabii ana maadui miongoni mwa wakosefu, wanao mfanyia uadui na wanaupinga wito wake. Na Mwenyezi Mungu atakunusuru, na atakuongoa mpaka uwashinde. Na Yeye anakutosha kwa uwongofu na kukunusuru.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika jaʿalnā likulli nabiyyin ʿaduwwan mina al-muj'rimīna wakafā birabbika hādiyan wanaṣīran
